title: NPCIL Notification 2026 - Apply Online for 114 Stipendiary Trainee/ Technician Posts
description: The Nuclear Power Corporation of India Limited (NPCIL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 114 Scientific Assistant, Stipendiary Trainee/ Scientific Assistant, Assistant Gr.1, X-Ray Technician Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Diploma in Mechanical, Electrical, Civil Engineering, 10th, 12th, ITI, Diploma, Any Degree, B.Sc. can apply f...
